examples.example: 良好的关系让我们的生活更加美好和充实。

translate.english: Good relationships make our lives more beautiful and fulfilling.

examples.example: 保持友善的关系会让我们的每一天都充满阳光和快乐。

translate.english: Maintaining a friendly relationship will make every day of our lives full of sunshine and happiness.

examples.example: 我们要努力维护好与他人之间良好的关系，这样才能让生活更加和谐美满。

translate.english: We should strive to maintain good relationships with others well, so as to make life more harmonious and happy.
